name: rollerstrut-superfunkrollerdisco-website
description: Website for Superfunk Roller Disco built on Eleventy and deployed to Netlify.

scripts.build: ELEVENTY_ENV=prd NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && npx @11ty/eleventy & npx tailwindcss -i src/_assets/styles/main.css -o dist/assets/styles/$npm_package_config_shortname.css --minify
scripts.dev: ELEVENTY_ENV=dev npm run clean && npx @11ty/eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i src/_assets/styles/main.css -o dist/assets/styles/$npm_package_config_shortname.css --watch
